Number of hydrogen bond in the backbone of the protein(Hbd)

This index counts the number of backbone H-bonds for each residue.

Where takes value one if the nitrogen atom of residue i is H-bonded with the oxygen atom of residue j and cero otherwise, in the same way takes value one if the oxygen atom of residue i is H-bonded with the nitrogen atom of residue j and cero otherwise.
